dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4111 IH: Spurring Business in Communities Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. McMorris Rodgers introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to improve the number of small business investment companies in underlicensed States, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Spurring Business in Communities Act of 2017.

section.header: Improving the number of small business investment companies in underlicensed States
section.text: The Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 661 et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (18)(E), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (19), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: the term underlicensed State means a State in which the number of licensees per capita is less than the median number of licensees per capita for all States, as calculated by the Administrator.

clause.text: in subparagraph (B)(iii), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (C), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: shall give first priority to an applicant that is located in an underlicensed State with below median financing, as determined by the Administrator.

clause.text: by redesignating clauses (ii) and (iii) as clauses (i) and (ii), respectively; and
by amending clause (i), as so redesignated, to read as follows:
is located in a State that—

subclause.text: is not served by a licensee; or

clause.text: in subparagraph (B), by inserting and licensing after financing;
by redesignating subparagraphs (C) through (J) as subparagraphs (E) through (L), respectively; and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following:

subparagraph.text: Steps taken by the Administration to improve the number of licensees in underlicensed States.
The Administration's plans to support States that seek to increase the number of licensees in the State.

clause.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (D), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: the geographic dispersion of licensees in each State compared to the population of the State, identifying underlicensed States.
